entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Beaver Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Island 1:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
